spiritsExplanation: The workout video is classified as primarily High-Energy & Intense, scoring 0.9, based on explicit keywords like 'Cardio HIIT', 'intense', 'extreme sweaty', 'caloriekiller', and expressions in the description highlighting its sweaty nature.
